    C

    CombatLevel - Class in levels
    Represents a combat level in the game, where a hero faces a group of monsters within a specific scenario.
    CombatLevel(Hero, Scenario, int, ArrayList<Monster>) - Constructor for class levels.CombatLevel
    Constructs a CombatLevel with the given hero, scenario, challenge rating, and monsters.

    D

    S

    Scenario - Enum Class in levels.scenarios
